title: Nourishing Style, Better Relationship
research: This quiz is based on nutritional psychology and explores how your eating habits influence your mental and emotional well-being in your relationship.
description: Do you and your partner snack on joy or feast on tension? Find out how your eating style affects your relationship in a fun way with this light-hearted quiz!

options: A healthy smoothie packed with fruits.

options: I have a detailed grocery list and a meal prep plan.

options: I'm always excited to try new flavors and dishes!

I'm open-minded and can be persuaded to try.

options: A fancy dinner at a local organic restaurant.

options: A master chef in the making!

options: Almost every meal! We love sharing food.

options: Absolutely love them! Let's do it!
I'd give it a try if it's fun.

I prefer lounging on the couch instead.

options: To boost my energy and feel great!

evaluation_method.explanation: Each answer corresponds to one of the following nourishing styles: 1) Health Enthusiast, 2) Balanced Eater, 3) Indulgent Snacker, 4) Experimental Cook, 5) Convenience Seeker.
evaluation_method.example: For example, if you selected option 1) most frequently, your Nourishing Style is Health Enthusiast, indicating you prioritize nutrition and energy while enjoying meals with your partner.

title: The Honesty Spectrum Assessment
research: Based on research on degrees of honesty and their impact on relationships, this assessment helps identify where couples fall on the honesty spectrum.
description: Ready to dive into the waters of truth-telling? This quiz guides you in understanding your honesty levels and finding that sweet spot where honesty meets tact!

title: Digital Detox Style Assessment
